analysis.key_quote: Efficiency by itself is MEANINGLESS. One can do the WRONG thing very EFFICIENTYLY. To be EFFECTIVE, one has to do THE RIGHT THING EFFICIENTLY.
analysis.rationale: The comment criticizes the chaotic and politically motivated nature of the process, emphasizing the importance of merit and due process in employment decisions. It expresses concerns about the politicization of civil service and the impact on employee rights.
